message.content:
Subject: Resignation from [Company Name]

Dear [Boss’s Name],

It is with a heavy heart that I write this email to inform you of my decision to resign from [Company Name]. After much contemplation, I have come to the conclusion that it's time for me to move on and explore new opportunities.

I want to take this opportunity to thank you for all your support during my tenure at [Company Name]. Your guidance and mentorship have been invaluable to me, and I am grateful for the trust and confidence you have placed in me. You have always been a great source of inspiration, and it has been an honor working under your leadership.

I would like to assure you that I will continue to work diligently until my last day, which is [Date], to ensure a smooth transition for my responsibilities. I will also do everything in my power to minimize any disruption to ongoing projects and initiatives. Please let me know if there's anything else I can do to make this process as seamless as possible.

I would appreciate it if you could provide me with the necessary forms and documentation required for my resignation, as well as any feedback or suggestions you may have for improving my performance in the remaining weeks.

Once again, thank you for everything you've done for me during my time at [Company Name]. It has been a pleasure working with such a talented and dedicated team, and I wish you and the company all the best for the future.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
